paragraph.value: Table 2 shows the development results of various S-LSTM settings, Adding one additional sentence-level node does not lead to accuracy improvements, although the number of parameters and decoding time increase accordingly. The accuracies of S-LSTM increases as the hidden layer size for each node increases from
, but does not further increase when the size increases beyond
. We fix the hidden size to
accordingly. Without using (cid:104)s(cid:105) and (cid:104)/s(cid:105), the performance of S-LSTM drops from
%, showing the effectiveness of having these additional nodes.
